SgtHammer.name: Spider Mines
SgtHammer.description: Create 3 mines that arm after 1.25 seconds. Mines detonate when an enemy comes in range, dealing 96 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and Slowing them by 25% for 1.5 seconds.  Siege Mode: Cast range increased by 100%.

SgtHammer.name: Concussive Blast
SgtHammer.description: Deal 141 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in front of Sgt. Hammer and knock them back.  Siege Mode: Radius increased by 50%.

SgtHammer.name: Neosteel Plating
SgtHammer.description: Gain 25 Armor for 2 seconds.  Siege Mode: Grants 100% more Armor.

SgtHammer.name: Napalm Strike
SgtHammer.description: Deals 164 (+4% per level) damage on impact, and leaves a napalm area that deals 50 (+4% per level) damage per second. Lasts for 4 seconds.

SgtHammer.name: Blunt Force Gun
SgtHammer.description: Fire a missile across the battlefield, dealing 500 (+3% per level) damage to non-Structure enemies in its path.

SgtHammer.name: Siege Mode
SgtHammer.description: Activate to enter Siege Mode. While in Siege Mode, Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage, have 100% increased range, and deal 25% of their damage as splash damage around the target.

SgtHammer.name: Thrusters
SgtHammer.description: Increase Movement Speed by 60% for 4 seconds. Thrusters are always active while at the Hall of Storms. Activating Thrusters cancels Siege Mode.

1.name: Ambush
1.description: Gain Stealth when entering Siege Mode or after not taking or dealing damage for 3 seconds while in Siege Mode. Basic Attacks while Stealthed deal 100% more damage.  Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.

1.name: Advanced Artillery
1.description: Increase Siege Mode's splash damage to 50% of Basic Attack damage, and increase its splash radius by 25%.

1.name: Maelstrom Rounds
1.description: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage dealt by 30% for 5 seconds. Hitting enemy Heroes or Structures with Basic Attacks while in Siege Mode reduces the cooldown of Maelstrom Rounds by 5 seconds.  Stores up to 3 charges.

4.name: Barricade
4.description: Reduce Concussive Blast's cooldown by 4 seconds, its Mana cost by 40, and when cast create an impassable wall in front of Sgt. Hammer for 4 seconds.

4.name: Siege Tactics
4.description: Using Neosteel Plating while in Siege Mode grants Unstoppable for 2 seconds, as long as she remains in Siege Mode.

4.name: Regenerative Bio-Steel
4.description: Basic Attacks while in Siege Mode heal for 10% of the damage dealt.

7.name: Pulse Detonation Core
7.description: Spider Mines detonate 3 times over 3 seconds.  Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant 5 Mana and reduce the cooldown of Spider Mines by 1.5 seconds.  Increase this bonus to 2.5 seconds while in Siege Mode.

7.name: Hover Siege Mode
7.description: Sgt. Hammer can move at 40% Movement Speed while in Siege Mode.

7.name: Graduating Range
7.description: While in Siege Mode, Basic Attack range is increased by 1 every 2 seconds, up to 3.

10.name: Blunt Force Gun
10.description: Fire a missile across the battlefield, dealing 500 (+3% per level) damage to non-Structure enemies in its path.

10.name: Napalm Strike
10.description: Deals 164 (+4% per level) damage on impact, and leaves a napalm area that deals 50 (+4% per level) damage per second. Lasts for 4 seconds.

13.name: Tactical Mine Deployment
13.description: Moving while Thrusters is active leaves a trail of up to 5 Spider Mines. Additionally, increase the Slow of Spider Mines by 15%.

13.name: Entrenched
13.description: While in Siege Mode, Concussive Blasts's damage and knockback distance are increased by 75%.

13.name: Hyper-Cooling Engines
13.description: While in Siege Mode, hitting Heroes with Basic Attacks reduces the cooldown of Thrusters by 5 seconds.

16.name: Mechanical Know-how
16.description: Neosteel Plating grants 20% maximum Health as a Shield for 2 seconds and increases Basic Attack damage by 30% for 5 seconds.

16.name: Executioner
16.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

16.name: Giant Killer
16.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

20.name: Orbital BFG
20.description: Blunt Force Gun's missile orbits the planet every 5 seconds. Only the last missile fired orbits.

20.name: Advanced Lava Strike
20.description: Napalm Strike's range is increased by 75% and its impact does 50% more damage.

20.name: Shrapnel Mines
20.description: Upon detonating, Spider Mines reduce the armor of enemy Heroes hit by 10, up to 30, for 4 seconds.

20.name: Ultra Capacitors
20.description: Hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Attacks while in Siege Mode grants 5% Attack Speed for 5 seconds, up to 40%.
